title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Project for Designing Sustainable Development Education Policies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of sustainable development, foundational knowledge in ecology and public health, and understanding of mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Targeting pre-service and in-service teachers, focusing on policy design using mathematical approaches; operated in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Real-world sustainability issues can be analyzed through mathematical modeling and solution strategies proposed
Educational policies can be designed considering a balance between ecocentric and anthropocentric paradigms
Feasibility assessment reports for environment-health linkage policies can be collaboratively written using PBL methodologies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
